attributes.action: Make the first day after lockdown  a national bank holiday every year
attributes.additional_details:
The start of 2020 has been a real struggle for the entire United Kingdom. Government included. This coronavirus pandemic has almost wiped out the whole infrastructure of this country. Everyone has worked tirelessly to help bring this horrific disease under control.  Why not let us have the chance to look back every year on how we as a nation fought back during this pandemic.
Let’s make the last day of lockdown be the first day of freedom from coronavirus and let us have that DATE a national bank holiday
attributes.background:
Almost every single person in this country has supported the government by abiding by the lockdown rules. Let the government give us something back. 
A national bank holiday for everyone would be a yearly reminder of how this country worked together during the coronavirus pandemic,
